headline: How to rewatch the Democratic Pennsylvania U.S. Senate debate
author: George Stockburger
sentences:
Here’s how to rewatch the Democratic Pennsylvania U.S. Senate debate
The debate can be rewatched on abc27.com or any of our sister stations in Pennsylvania
The U.S. Senate Debate was carried on the following stations and websites:

You can follow along on Twitter using the #PASen and watch our post-debate coverage immediately after both on-air and online.
WHTM abc27 News anchor and Capitol Bureau Reporter Dennis Owens and WPXI Anchor Lisa Sylvester co-moderated the debate from the abc27 studio in Harrisburg.
Governor John Fetterman, Congressman Conor Lamb, and State State Representative Malcolm Kenyatta debated from the abc27 studio in Harrisburg.
A debate between the Republican Senate candidates will be held on April 25 and the candidates for Governor will debate on April 27.
Get the latest news on Pennsylvania Politics and the 2022 Election from Your Local Election Headquarters.
The debate was broadcasted to all 67 counties in the Keystone State and live-streamed to millions more.
Senator Pat Toomey debated for an hour under the lights in Harrisburg on Thursday.
(WHTM) – Three of the Democratic Party candidates vying to replace U.S.
Senator from Pennsylvania is scheduled to take place on May 17.
Voters must register to vote by May 2.
